reasons_to_visit.details: Liberec offers spectacular New Year's fireworks over the Old Town Square and Ještěd Tower, creating a magical start to the year with mountain backdrops.
Snow-covered Ještěd Mountain and surrounding landscape create a fairy-tale atmosphere perfect for photography and winter sports.
Perfect time to explore Liberec's Regional Gallery, Liberec Castle, and historic interiors without summer crowds.
Aquapark Babylon provides tropical escape while cafés and restaurants offer warm refuge with hearty Czech cuisine.
Off-season rates for accommodations and fewer tourists mean a more authentic local experience.

reasons_to_avoid.details: January temperatures often drop below freezing, especially on Ještěd Mountain, requiring warm winter clothing for outdoor activities.
Short winter days with limited sunlight can affect outdoor activity timing and mountain visibility.
Severe weather conditions may close cable car access to Ještěd Tower and limit mountain activities.

special_events.description: Winter cultural events and art exhibitions
